about_the_game:
Activate your inner lewd with the ViRo Live Studio - Adult Streamer Tools




This enables support for:
  • Direct Adult Toy integration
  • Chaturbate API integration

Direct Adult Toy integration

ViRo Live Studio can control most Bluetooth enabled adult toys. This gives you a great way to interact with your viewers in a fun and intimate way.

Chaturbate API Integration

Automate actions in ViRo Live Studio with the chaturbate API integration. You can have your scene respond by tips, goals, message reactions, and full chat support within the app. Take the API integration to a whole new level when you couple it with console commands. You could write an entire interactive game if you wanted to!

content_descriptors.notes: This contains tools to enable streamers to perform as an avatar on adult platforms.  This includes adult toy integration and API access to chaturbate.

name: ViRo Live Studio - Adult Streamer Tools

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350
  • Graphics: nVidia 970 GTX
  • Storage: 50 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7
  • Graphics: nVidia 1080 GTX
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
